categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Lyla was a female Jedi Apprentice residing on Makeb with her Master, Suz-Anz, until 3638 BBY, when both were killed.

Lyla appears in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel expansion to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on Makeb. She is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means she was killed.
